What version you are running? The stack trace doesn't seem accurate.
I've added some null checks. Please update from CVS when you'll have chance.

Just tried with what I think is the latest, stack trace is now as below.  To replicate you must be offline and the task must have no offline data.

java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.mylar.internal.jira.ui.editor.JiraTaskEditor.isTaskParametersSynchronized(JiraTaskEditor.java:238)
	at org.eclipse.mylar.internal.jira.ui.editor.JiraTaskEditor.createFormContent(JiraTaskEditor.java:123)

Mik your stack trace still don't match code in CVS. I've just committed small fix (see CVS revision 1.23 for JiraTaskEditor), but code from my previous commit should also work.

I've tested it and got "connection refused" popup and then editor shows up with the "task data not available" warning.

The error popup is shown by the SynchronizeTaskJob.run(IProgressMonitor monitor) method and if I am not mistaken we have a bug about that
The internal implementation has changed significantly since the report was opened. Please open a new report if you see the error again.
